questions.context: Read a text aloudThe holiday gift-giving season has arrived. So, in the spirit of the season, Falcondale Clothing has reduced prices on our most popular gift items. Come and see our large selection of new T-shirts, golf shirts, and sweatshirts, all reduced thirty to fifty percent. This Saturday only, shoppers will receive an additional fifteen percent discount!

Read a text aloudAre you feeling left behind in today’s world of technology? Well, then, come to Vermont Computer Center this Saturday at 11 o’clock for a class on using the Internet. You can learn how to surf the Web and e-mail friends, relatives, and businesses. Even though most people find these skills invaluable, the class is offered free of charge!

Imagine that an English-language technology magazine is doing research in your area. You have agreed to participate in a telephone interview about e-books.Question 5: Have you ever bought e-books instead of paper books?Question 6: What do you like best about reading e-books?Question 7: Which of the following do you think is the best device for reading e-books?A smartphoneA laptop computerAn e-reader

Question 8: Could you tell me how much it costs to attend?Question 9: For a big seminar like this, I guess you have ten or twelve workshops to choose from, right?Question 10: Could you please tell me what topics are going to be discussed in the morning?
Should companies allow their employees to have a flexible work schedule?Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
